predicate.note: Frames file for 'effect' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause an effect

example.name: perilous example
example.text: Mr. Dang is alleged [*-1] to have used the account of Singapore hotel and property magnate Ong Beng Seng [*-2] to effect the transactions.

example.name: proper lexical item
example.text: But even if he effects a Hyde-to-Jekyll transformation, he will face a serious ideological crisis and Reunification Scenario Two.

roleset.note: The difference between 'effect' and 'affect' is one of the great pitfalls of English. 'Affect' means to influence, 'effect' means to bring about or execute.
